post_title: FS - T206 Magee Portrait EDPG - PSA 2.  Tough!!
post_content: For Sale - T206 Magee Portrait with EDPG reverse - PSA 2.   Very difficult to find only 9 total psa copies graded (2 of those have qualifiers), a must for EPDG entire back run or Magee back run collectors.  $1550 venmo no fee or $1600.00 pp gs firm.  Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  NC residents please add 6.5% ST.
